title: Can you give me some links to objective books on physics, chemistry and biology for NEET preparation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there!!! I searched a lot for the links but unfortunately couldn't find one.. Better buy them online or refer market… Can't you afford them?? I am sure you can… coz if you can afford Internet for quora or our other help, means at least you aren't poor I can't tell you the links but surely can help you on which books to buy. MTG Ncert objective at your finger tips biology ……2. Dinesh objective physics…… 3. For Chemistry Again MTG Ncert at your finger tips…… These three books will cost you around 2000 rupees…. I hope 2000 rupees won't be heartbreaking for you!! Have a nice day ahead…. Thanks…

First of all I’ll advice you to buy books from the market and not online as buying books online does not assure you of its quality and it is costlier too. Then coming to the point :- Physics - DC PANDEY and NCERT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS. These two books are jUST enough. Chemistry - NCERT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS .If you want to excell in organic chemistry then ORGANIC CHEMISTRY BY DK SINGH. Biology- NCERT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS. Study your ncert books thoroughly.
